page.title: 01W.WRATTING & W.WICKHAM AREA
page.content: This block is an arable farming area including parts of three small villages. The landscape is mainly open with large cultivated fields and occasional small woods. Some fields have boundary hedges, others are unfenced. The farm and village buildings are a mixture of old and new Although most of the villagers work outside the area there is a good village social life with a number of clubs and local events. Children travel outside the area to school and the local shops and traders can only provide a limited range of goods and services. Most villagers travel by car to larger towns although there are some local bus services. Unemployment and crime rates are low. There is a mixture of social classes including newcomers and old established residents
